title: ADR Artifact Schema
description: Schema for validating Architecture Decision Record artifact frontmatter

id.description: Unique identifier for the ADR (e.g., ADR-001)

status.description: Status of the decision (proposed, accepted, rejected, superseded)

date.description: Date of the decision in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

uow_ref.description: Reference to the parent Unit of Work

superseded_by.description: ID of the ADR that supersedes this one (if superseded)
